references.paper_title: Third-order tensors as operators on matrices: A theoretical and computational framework with applications in imaging
references.reason: This paper provides the foundational theoretical framework for tensor-tensor products and t-SVD, which are central to the proposed Ft-SVD framework.

references.paper_title: Tensor-tensor algebra for optimal representation and compression of multiway data
references.reason: This paper extends the t-SVD framework to handle large-scale datasets, which is crucial for addressing the challenges posed by CDS in multi-output regression.

references.paper_title: Tackling combinatorial distribution shift: A matrix completion perspective
references.reason: This paper introduces the ERM-DS algorithm for single-output learning under CDS, which is extended and adapted for multi-output regression in this work.

references.paper_title: Functional bayesian tucker decomposition for continuous-indexed tensor data
references.reason: This paper introduces functional Bayesian Tucker decomposition, which is relevant to the functional tensor decomposition approach taken in this paper.

references.paper_title: A continuous analogue of the tensor-train decomposition
references.reason: This paper introduces a continuous analogue of the tensor-train decomposition, which is related to the functional t-SVD proposed in this paper.
